summary.para: Describes an entry in an address map.

remarks.para: An address map provides a translation from one image layout (A) to another (B). An array of OMAP structures, sorted by rva, defines an address map.
To translate an address, addrA, in image A to an address, addrB, in image B, perform the following steps:

item.description: Search the map for the entry, e, with the largest rva less than or equal to addrA.

summary.para: A relative virtual address (RVA) in image A.
The relative virtual address that rva is mapped to in image B.
